title: (x) Battlestar Galactica science fiction sans - Handel Gothic {Geoff Riding}
content:
Hi I am new to this site, its really useful to have a forum like this if we ever need to identify a type face isn’t it?!

Anyway, I am looking for a particular typeface. I’m sure you’ve all seen it, it is used in a lot of science fiction contexts (it is the typeface used on the battle star galactica dvd boxes underneath the title) and I think the commonly found Terminator 2 font is a mod of it, however the the “A”’s are most definitely very different. I’ll post an image of it too just to clear up any doubts.

Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025103739im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontExample_5401.jpg)
